content.question: The political cartoon above from the 1930s illustrates

choices.label: the perceived problem of European over-population
British indifference to aggression by the Axis powers
France’s dependence on goods from the British Empire
Austria’s role as a buffer between the Soviet Union and the new states of central Europe

content.answer: British indifference to aggression by the Axis powers

topic.text: 8.11: Continuity and Changes in an Age of Global Conflict

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
